channel.title: Whonix 15 development
channel.description:
Status: * https://forums.whonix.org/t/port-whonix-from-debian-stretch-to-debian-buster/7101 done * task list mostly done https://phabricator.whonix.org/maniphest/query/BYmg1nGikkjV/#R * testing in progress * https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-virtualbox-15-0-0-0-7-debian-buster-based-testers-wanted/7131/10 * https://forums.whonix.org/t/upgrade-whonix-virtualbox-14-whonix-virtualbox-15-testers-wanted/7132/4 * https://forums.whonix.org/t/qubes-whonix-version-14-debian-stretch-based-can-be-upgraded-to-version-15-debian-buster-based-testers-wanted/7143/8 * Qubes-Whonix 15 templates: [blocker](https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4970)
Next things to do: fix bug reported in the testing threads.

item.title: Whonix 15 development
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix 15 VIrtualBox builds currently broken since VirtualBox was removed from Debian buster. Will probably be re-added in buster-backports. Workaround until fix [1] gets developed:

Add virtualbox packages to whonix_build_script_skip_package_install Whonix build script variable or by manually continuing on VirtualBox guest additions package installation.

[1] The fix will be: Re-add the source code similar like in Whonix 14 build process: download from wherever available (buster-backports in future, sid for now and add to Whonix local (and remote) repository.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 15 development
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Status:

  • port Whonix from Debian stretch to Debian buster done
  • task list mostly done https://phabricator.whonix.org/maniphest/query/BYmg1nGikkjV/#R
  • testing in progress
    • Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.0.7 - Debian buster based - Testers Wanted!
    • Upgrade Whonix VirtualBox 14 -> Whonix VirtualBox 15 - Testers Wanted!
    • Qubes-Whonix version 14 (Debian stretch based) can be upgraded to version 15 (Debian buster based). - Testers Wanted!
  • Qubes-Whonix 15 templates: blocker

Next things to do: fix bug reported in the testing threads.

Read full topic
